caption.title: Seropositivity for influenza vaccine viruses in the studied groups of people from various geographical regions of Russia before the 2017–2018 epidemic season.
caption.p: The X axis–Russian regions, the Y axis–% of HI positive samples. The values on the bars are mean, the error bars denote the standard error of mean; Blue, positive samples to the A/Michigan/45/2015 A(H1N1)pdm09 vaccine virus; Red, positive samples to the A/HongKong/4801/2014 A(H3N2) vaccine virus; Green, positive samples to the B/Brisbane/60/2008 (Victoria lineage) vaccine virus.
